title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 650.4 - Certified operators required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 650.4 - Certified operators required

State Regulations
(a) A wastewater treatment plant must at all times be under the responsible
supervision of a chief operator or assistant/shift operator certified pursuant
to this Part. (b) Tables 1 and 2
(section
650.12
of this Part) indicate the
minimum grade chief operator and assistant/shift operator required to be in
responsible charge of the actual operation of a wastewater treatment plant and
a summary of the required qualifications of the chief operator and
assistant/shift operator. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
650.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
